Posts.Content: KDGayle wrote: Hi.  I'm 29 years old  and a mother of 2 that I did nurse but my youngest is 3.  About a week ago I started having pain in what I thought was my nipple.  As days went by and the pain continued to bother me I noticed my right breast around the nipple was red and I could feel a small lump under or just on the edge of the areola.  It feels like I can push it deeper into my breast.I don't have health insurance for the month of July and don't have the money to pay for a doctor.  We had some antibiotics here at home so I started taking them to see if there were any changes from possibly and infection.  So far no change in 3 days.  Does this sound like something that could wait until August??  Or should I try and find a free clinic??  Also, what kind of doctor should I see??  So many things go through your mind when you face something like this.  Just worried... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Questions.... KDGayle daisy234
